content:
# An error occurred while attempting to insert wood into the stone furnace. The error indicates that the `insert_item` function does not accept a `position` argument.
# This suggests that the function may require a different method of specifying the target entity for item insertion.

# To resolve this, I will first check the available functions for inserting items into the furnace. 
# Typically, in Factorio, you would use the furnace's inventory directly rather than specifying a position.

# I will attempt to insert the wood and iron ore into the furnace without specifying the position.
# First, I will insert the wood as fuel.
insert_item(Prototype.Wood, quantity=5)  # Insert wood into the furnace for fuel.

# Next, I will insert the iron ore into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, quantity=10)  # Insert iron ore into the furnace.

# After attempting to insert the items, I will check the status of the furnace and the inventory again.
print(f"Entities after attempting to insert fuel and iron ore: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Inventory after attempting to insert fuel and iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
